last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 30
last_episode_to_air.overview: Situ Feng encourages Qingqing to devote more time to her drawings. Months later, Situ Feng receives an offer from a record label in the U.S.

name: Accidentally In Love
overview: When Si Tu Feng decides to go back to school, he becomes the center of attention as fans, classmates and the media follow his every move. He meets Chen Qing Qing, an ordinary student with a dual personality.
tagline: The quirky experiences of a popular singer who returns to school and becomes seat mates with a seemingly ordinary girl.

episodes.name: Accidentally in Love
episodes.overview:
The quirky experiences of a popular singer who returns to school and becomes seat mates with a seemingly ordinary girl.

When Si Tu Feng decides to go back to school, he becomes the center of attention as fans, classmates and the media follow his every move. He meets Chen Qing Qing, an ordinary student with a dual personality.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In an act of rebellion, Situ Feng drags Qingqing to his dad's wedding and makes an earth-shattering announcement. Gu Nanxi bumps into Qingqing again.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Zhang Fangfang gives Qingqing a tour of Ming De College, where Qingqing confronts three hostile queen bees and gets kicked out by security.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: On the first day of class, Qingqing declares desk mate Situ Feng her archrival and learns that Gu Nanxi may be the gatekeeper to information on her dad.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Qingqing launches a vending scheme to help Fangfang earn enough cash to stay in school, and tries to sell classmates tickets to her desk near Situ Feng.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: To give Qingqing a hard time, Lan Xinya assigns her to manual labor at the student union. Qingqing tricks Situ Feng into performing a surprise show.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: To win a cash prize for Fangfang, Qingqing joins a competition to star with Situ Feng in a music video -- but she must revert to her old self to win.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: On Situ Feng and Qing Chen's first day of filming, fans bombard the location of the shoot. Lin Yiyang abducts Qingqing and Fangfang to bait Situ Feng.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Situ Feng tells Qing Chen of his past with Lan Xinyu. When Lan Xinya accuses Qingqing of selling expired snacks, Situ Feng finds a way to absolve her.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Situ Feng drinks too much wine and tries to kiss Qingqing in front of classmates. Yiyang helps Fangfang ward off a group of street thugs.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Qingqing visits an under-the-weather Situ Feng. Gu Nanxi comes to a sudden realization when he sees Qingqing playing the piano at rehearsal.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Qingqing discovers the real reason why Situ Feng called off the music video. At her teacher Chen Xiao's place, Qingqing finds a photo of her parents.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Situ Feng tells Qing Chen about Qingqing -- and suggests an introduction. When Gu Nanxi's brother spites Qingqing, Situ Feng stands firmly by her side.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: To convince her grandpa to let her stay at Ming De College, Qingqing enters a beauty contest, where she schools the judges on beauty standards.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: When the mandatory school trip coincides with Qing Chen and Situ Feng's music video shoot, Qingqing must pull off a series of quick outfit changes.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: When Qingqing skips school, Situ Feng cross-dresses to sneak into the women's dorm and check on her. Qingqing finds out the truth about her parents.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Lin Yiyang bullies Qingqing after Xinya complains to him about her. A violent showdown triggers memories of a tragic event in Situ Feng's past.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Situ Feng visits Fangfang in the hospital and brings Yiyang steamed buns. Qingqing is determined to help Situ Feng overcome his fear of water.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Qingqing's grandpa helps her set up a fake home in the village for Situ Feng's unannounced visit and invites Qingqing's friend Xiao Lan to test him.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Xiao Lan interrupts Situ Feng and Qingqing's heart-to-heart in the countryside. Yiyang blackmails Qingqing while Situ Feng is away for work.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: In the wake of the plagiarism scandal, Situ Feng has only days before the release to write a new song. Fangfang pleads with Yiyang to tell the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: After Situ Feng's press conference, Yiyang gets in trouble with Situ Feng fans. Over dinner, Gu Nanxi encourages Qingqing to come clean to Situ Feng.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Lan Xinya's ploy turns Situ Feng against Qingqing and Gu Nanxi. Qingqing's web alias receives an offer from Situ Feng's manager for the new album.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Qingqing dresses as a panda for her business meeting with Situ Feng. The clock tower responds in a man's voice when Qingqing asks it to turn back time.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Yang Lanting and Xinya scheme against Qingqing during a beach outing. Xinya ends up in the hospital after Situ Feng asks Qingqing to be his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Situ Feng receives an urgent note from Xinya and finds himself in a bind when Lanting guilts him into leaving Qingqing.

episodes.name: Episode 27
episodes.overview: After a teary phone call with Situ Feng, Qingqing tells her grandpa she'd like to take on the family business. Xinya gets a surprise at the altar.

episodes.name: Episode 28
episodes.overview: Hua Munian offers to help Xinya overcome her sorrow. Situ Feng and Qingqing decide to reveal her true identity to fans -- but someone beats them to it.

episodes.name: Episode 29
episodes.overview: Situ Feng disguises himself for his outing with Qingqing, who faces internet trolls and sets out to prove herself a good Samaritan.

episodes.name: Episode 30
episodes.overview: Situ Feng encourages Qingqing to devote more time to her drawings. Months later, Situ Feng receives an offer from a record label in the U.S.
